bibl.title: Abraham, Isaac, and Osiris-Michael. The Use of Biblical Figures in Egyptian Religion, a Survey.
bibl.note: Who Uses Biblical Figures and Stories? - What Biblical Figures and Stories Were Employed? - Why and How Biblical Figures Were Used? - When Were Biblical Figures Used? - How Did the Egyptians Learn of Biblical Characters? - When Did They Become Familiar With Biblical Figures? - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Achievements and Problems of Modern Egyptology. Proceedings of the International Conference Held in Moscow on September 29 - October 2, 2009.

bibl.seg: Kerry Muhlestein, Abraham, Isaac, and Osiris-Michael. The Use of Biblical Figures in Egyptian Religion, a Survey.

Galina A. Belova & Sergej V. Ivanov (edd.), Achievements and Problems of Modern Egyptology. Proceedings of the International Conference Held in Moscow on September 29 - October 2, 2009 (Moscow, 2012) pp. 244-259.

Who Uses Biblical Figures and Stories? - What Biblical Figures and Stories Were Employed? - Why and How Biblical Figures Were Used? - When Were Biblical Figures Used? - How Did the Egyptians Learn of Biblical Characters? - When Did They Become Familiar With Biblical Figures? - Conclusions.
